definition: Bai Juyi (772-846), Tang dynasty poet
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
surname Ju
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: Chapter II is to analyze how Arthur Waley translates the poems of Bai Juyi in different types.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，分析韦利对白居易不同类型诗歌的翻译。

sentences.english: The famous poet Yuan Haowen in Jin kingdom thinks highly of poet Bai Juyi of the middle Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 金源著名诗人元好问对中唐诗人白居易颇为推崇。
《琵琶行》是白居易极负盛名的诗歌。

sentences.english: And the relationship between Yuan Haowen and Bai Juyi deserves further discussion.
sentences.chinese: 元好问与白居易之间的关系值得进一步探讨。

sentences.english: The exact time was in the earlier April of the fifteenth year of the throne of Emperor Li Chun when Bai Juyi left Zhongzhou for Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 白居易由忠州返京的具体时间为元和十五年四月初。

sentences.english: Bai Juyi, a famous poet. Yijiangnan is his famous poem.
sentences.chinese: 白居易，一位著名的诗人，《忆江南》是他的名篇。

sentences.english: Bai Juyi had influenced this family in the Various levels.
sentences.chinese: 白居易对这一家族产生了多层次影响。

sentences.english: The first dike was built in AD 821 by the poet Bai Juyi.
sentences.chinese: 第一道堤由诗人白居易于821年所建。

sentences.english: " The poem is Bai Juyi's poem" boasted five song" one.
sentences.chinese: 全诗本是白居易的七律《放言五首》其中的一首。

sentences.english: This essay mainly analyses the critical poems of Pak Toi Yick.
sentences.chinese: 本篇论文主要是研究白居易的讽谕诗。

sentences.english: Thirdly, there are several similarities between Arthur Waley and Bai Juyi.
sentences.chinese: 第三，韦利与白居易其人之共鸣。

sentences.english: This poem was composed by Bai Juyi when he attended the imperial examination.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗是诗人白居易参加科举考试时的习作。

Meng Jiao (751-814), Tang dynasty essayist and poet
Lu Zhaolin (637-689), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
Du Xunhe (846-904), Tang poet
Liu Zongyuan (773-819), Tang essayist and poet, advocate of the classical writing 古文運動|古文运动 and neoclassical 復古|复古 movements
Lu You (1125-1210), widely regarded as the greatest of the Southern Song poets
He Zhizhang (659-744), Tang dynasty poet
